questions.question: What is the dominant color of the bottle containing the capsules?
What is the primary text displayed prominently on the bottle's label?
What type of closure is present on the top of the supplement bottle?
What material appears to constitute the bottle's body?
What is written on the seal at the top of the bottle's cap?
What is indicated regarding the capsules' dietary restrictions?
What number of capsules does the container seem to hold, as visibly printed?
What is the apparent shape of the supplement container?
What is suggested by the label about the product's intended function?
What kind of image is displayed at the bottom of the label?
What is the descriptive term used to refer to the product's herbal constituents?
What is the text specifying the targeted area of the product's purported benefit?
What small circular logo is shown at the bottom right of the label?
What is indicated concerning the quality of the botanical blend in the product?
What is the overall visual impression of the product's packaging?
